long_description: With rugged style and durable oiled cotton canvas, the Dorfman Pacific Oilcloth Boonie Hat is built to withstand all your outdoor adventures, whether it's a desert safari or a hike through the forest. Oiled cotton canvas resists water; built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Dorfman Pacific Oilcloth Boonie Hat features an adjustable chin cord to keep hat securely in place.
short_description: With rugged style and durable oiled cotton canvas, the Dorfman Pacific Oilcloth Boonie Hat is built to withstand all your outdoor adventures, whether it's a desert safari or a hike through the forest.
